      • readJsonListToList

        public static final <T> java.util.List<T> readJsonListToList(java.util.List<java.lang.String> items,
                                                             java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        Give a list of json strings, and the bean mapper class, convert each item in the list of json strings to a bean object. This is a convenience function for processing many separate json strings.
        Parameters:
        items - the list of json strings
        clazz - the bean object for mapping json to
        Returns:
        the list of bean objects mapped from the json strings.
